entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Snow level 1800 metres lowering to valley bottom late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
